snippet: Protesters coming from an anarchist book fair used pipes and bottles on store windows and then against the police, officers said.
abstract: As many as 150 demonstrators coming from an anarchist book fair near Manhattan's Washington Square Park march to a nearby Starbucks and begin swinging at the windows with metal pipes, causing frightened customers to hide under tables; confrontation ends with three arrests and minor injuries to two police officers.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and COLIN MOYNIHAN

lead_paragraph: Protesters coming from an anarchist book fair used pipes and bottles on store windows and then against the police, officers said.

headline.seo: 3 Arrested in Manhattan as March Becomes a Melee
headline.main: 3 Arrested in Manhattan as March Turns Into a Melee
headline.print_headline: 3 Arrested in Manhattan as March Turns Into a Melee
